comments.content:
The sans serif is Amplitude from Font Bureau.   
   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font\_frames.tpl?cart=10771180124355358&fontname=Amplitude](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516050733/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font_frames.tpl?cart=10771180124355358&fontname=Amplitude)

The serif is Charter, designed by Matthew Carter.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/charter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516050733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/charter/)
